      Event id 1074 on winsvr 2022 standard evaluation

      1 minute read

      On this page

      Related post:

      • https://velog.io/@leeyosebi/IIS-ARR-Configuration-with-ExSvr

      Well, Since I set up the ARR on IIS and ExSvr, the VM has been shuting down almost every hours. So the mail service can‚Äôt be last. and this is really annoying when I need to test. This post contains what I was trying to know what‚Äôs going on this.

      Mail service is unavailable:

      From the hyper-v host‚Äôs ‚ÄúEvent Viewer ‚Üí Applications and Services Logs ‚Üí Microsoft ‚Üí Windows ‚Üí Hyper-V-Worker ‚Üí Admin‚Äù, the server has been terminated. But no reason can be found.

      Let‚Äôs moving forward to the VM‚Äôs event logs. I check the event viewer of the VM‚Äôs ‚ÄúWindows Logs > System‚Äù and filter the events 1074 which can shows me the shuting down logs.

      Error message:

      The process C:\Windows\system32\wlms\wlms.exe (ALLDC01) has initiated the shutdown of computer ALLDC01 on behalf of user NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEM for the following reason: Other (Planned)
 Reason Code: 0x80000000
 Shutdown Type: shutdown
 Comment: The license period for this installation of Windows has expired. The operating system is shutting down.

      Obviously, the message says the system has been shutdown this computer in the system context(NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEM) because of its OS license. I‚Äôve never seen this before..

      Well, I have set this up with this ISO. It‚Äôs Standard Evaluation.

      In result, I found this is the originally architecture of the OS. Referrence:

      • https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/evalcenter/evaluate-windows-server-2022
      • https://woshub.com/stop-windows-auto-shutdown-every-hour/

      Updated: December 6, 2025
